I'm tired of trying to do things

@DreamHost @DreamHostCare @DreamHost @dhstatus Please make an effort to remedy this situation immediately without me having to tweet at you throughout the whole process, I cannot imagine how you would feel if the email address all your clients use was suddenly unusable and your web host was unhelpful

@DreamHost @DreamHostCare I have been with @DreamHost for over 10 years and host over 28 websites through them - this whole experience has been so bad, their support so ineffectual, that I am seriously considering moving to a new service for the first time It would take days, but this is unacceptable.

@DreamHost @DreamHostCare So @DreamHost and @DreamHostCare never figured out my issue leaving me to move all of my professional comms to a different email address (hell) ‚Äì now, 20 days later, I get an automated email that they think the address was compromised? https://t.co/YscEb4BmIA

I can see my breath, sitting in front of my computer. Let me find another hoodie...
Hardcore cleaning. Hard. Core.
Lounging, watching CSI.
Movies and TV Shows late into the night. Going to school tomorrow would be a waste of valuable time. So I sleep late and be happy.
Watching a movie and thinking about life. Good stuff, good stuff indeed.
Super-belated comment responses where I don't remember what I said is annoying. I'm missing half the conversation. That half, is my half.
